titleStmt.title: A suruey of certaine dialogical discourses: vvritten by Iohn Deacon, and Iohn Walker, concerning the doctrine of the possession and dispossession of diuels VVherein is manifested the palpable ignorance and dangerous errors of the discoursers, and what according to proportion of God his truth, every christian is to hold in these poyntes. Published by Iohn Darrell minister of the gospell.
titleStmt.author: Darrel, John, b. ca. 1562.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Deacon, John and Walker, John. Dialogicall discourses of spirits and divels.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
